text: Enamel is a smooth hard covering substance. It may refer to: * Tooth enamel, the hard mineralized surface of teeth * Enamel (glass), a smooth, durable coating made of melted and fused glass powder ==Related pages== * Enamel paint, a commercial paint that dries to an especially hard glossy finish * Enameled wire, wire insulated with enamel-like coating
title: Enamel
